description: This walk runs from Stoke Prior to Droitwich Spa along the John Corbett Way. The waymarked trail is named after local industrialist John Corbett. Corbett was associated with the salt industry during the Victorian era and nicknamed 'The Salt King'. The walk includes a pleasant section along the Worcester and Birmingham Canal and some fine views of the surrounding countryside.
display_address: Avoncroft Arts Centre, Redditch Road, Stoke Heath, Stoke CP, Stoke Pound, Bromsgrove, Worcestershire, England, B60 4JR, United Kingdom
